Joe Biden: s speech at the Iowa rally: The expert's verdict mentions that Joe Biden returned to Iowa on Oct. 30 and made a final pitch to voters in Des Moines. This verifies the claim that he was present at the rally.
Biden: s actual statement about COVID-19: The expert's verdict provides a transcript of Biden's speech where he talks about the impact of COVID-19 on the country. It includes the line "More than 200 and now I think it’s up to 30,000 people have died, Americans dead because COVID-19." This confirms that Biden mentioned the number of Americans who have died due to the virus.
Mention of the conservative blog post: The expert's verdict acknowledges the existence of a conservative blog post that claimed Biden said "America is dead." This verifies that there was a post spreading this information.
